document.full_text: as the japanese government grapples with a deepening crisis at the fukushima daiichi nuclear plant, japanese people are increasingly worried about their potential health risks from exposure to radiation.
document.title: what will japanese near reactors face long-term?
lines_and_colors: as the japanese government grapples with a deepening crisis at the fukushima daiichi nuclear plant, japanese people are increasingly worried about their potential health risks from exposure to radiation.
